title: Downloading

warning.title: Download may not work in this browser
warning.text: To download this file, please open this link in your browser.

progress.statusDetails: Large files may take a moment to begin
progress.trouble: ðŸ”„ Having trouble? Try again in new tab
progress.troubleSubtle: Having trouble? Try again in new tab
progress.troubleProminent: ðŸ”„ Having trouble? Try again in new tab
progress.backgroundDetails: Check your browser download bar (usually at bottom/top) for progress
progress.backgroundDetailsByPass: Check your browser download bar (usually at bottom/top) for progress â€” or confirmation that the download has already finished.
progress.inProgressDetails: Please wait while your file downloads
progress.downloadingMightDone: Downloading file...It may already be done.
progress.canCloseTab: You can close this tab if desired
progress.unableToClose: Unable to auto-close, you can manually close this tab
progress.pleaseWait: Please wait while your file downloads
progress.checkDownloads: You can check progress in the Downloads panel (Ctrl+J)
progress.started: âœ“ Download started in your browser (Firefox)
progress.havingTrouble: Having trouble? Try again or check your Downloads folder
progress.stoppedForNewTab: Download stopped in this tab - continuing in new tab

retry.confirmationTitle: A download may already be in progress. Check your browser's download bar first.
retry.confirmationSubtitle: Opening a new tab will start a fresh download.

e2ee.title: ðŸ”’ This file is encrypted
e2ee.description: Please enter the encryption key to decrypt and download:

firefoxBlocked.title: ðŸ”’ Encrypted Download Not Available
firefoxBlocked.details: Encrypted downloads larger than {{limit}} require a Chromium-based browser for streaming decryption.
firefoxBlocked.explanation: Large encrypted files cannot be streaming decrypted reliably in Firefox.
firefoxBlocked.useCLI: Or use the FastFileLink CLI
firefoxBlocked.smallFiles: Small encrypted files (<{{limit}}) work on Firefox

retryBlocked.title: Encrypted Download Requires This Page
retryBlocked.message: Direct browser downloads cannot decrypt this file. The decryption must happen in this page with your encryption key.
retryBlocked.solution1: Different Browser: Try Chrome, Edge, or Brave for better compatibility
retryBlocked.solution2Stable: for stable downloads of large encrypted files
retryBlocked.solution3: Wait: The download may still be progressing in the background

downloadFooter.message: PS: Wishing you a great day! Download your free file sharing app at

messages.iosRestricted: Downloads are restricted in this app. Please: (1) Tap the button below to share or copy the link, (2) Open {{browser}}, (3) Paste and open the link to {{action}}.
messages.androidRestricted: To {{action}} this file, tap the button below to open in {{browser}}. If that doesn't work, try the menu (â‹®) and select "Open in browser".
messages.generalRestricted: To {{action}} this file, please open this link in {{browser}}.

clipboard.copied: Link copied! Please paste it in Safari to download.
clipboard.failed: Could not copy link. Please manually copy the URL from your address bar.

download.fileSaved: File saved. Please check your download folder.

fallback.browserNotSupported: Downloads not supported in this browser
fallback.p2pDisabled: Device-to-Device P2P disabled. Use Relayed P2P.
fallback.fileTooBig: Large files need modern browser support. Consider switching browsers or using server relay.
fallback.webrtcNotSupported: WebRTC not supported - using server relay

needAssistance: If you need assistance, please contact us at

pointsNotEnough.reason: This download link is unavailable because the account has run out of user points.

runOutDownloadPoint.reason: This download link is unavailable because the times of downloads has reached the limit set by the file owner.

errors.folder_changed: The shared folder contents changed during transfer. The file owner needs to reshare the folder.
